name: Wordware
headline: IDE to develop, iterate and deploy AI Agents
description:
1. Collaborative IDE for Building AI Agents 
2. At its heart is a new programming language that merges plain English with concepts like loops, conditional statements, and function calling.
3. We also support forking, API deployment and sharing as a hosted app.

We have 300,000 users, and many companies paying us between 199 and 10k per month.

founders.name: Filip Kozera, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder and CEO at Wordware -- an IDE for Natural Language Programming and Agent Orchestration. Previously I cofounded and exited KRISTALIC, which tried to augment the human memory. Before that, I studied Deep Learning at Cambridge. 

The most interesting fact about me outside of work is that I travelled to 103 countries and was part of multiple high-altitude mountaineering expeditions and rescue operations in Kyrgyzstan and Nepal. I also do sailing, paragliding, kitesurfing and boxing.

founders.name: Robert Chandler, Founder
founders.description:
Robert Chandler is a founder & CTO at Wordware. 

He started his career as an early engineer at a self-driving car startup, Five AI, which was acquired by Bosch. Here he lead the Offline Perception team which accelerated the dev-test cycle through automated ground truthing and was awarded 5+ patents in the process.

He has been in the AI space for over a decade since studying Information Engineering at the University of Cambridge.

[Docs](https://wordware.ai/<https:/docs.wordware.ai/>)[Pricing](https://wordware.ai/</pricing>)[Careers](https://wordware.ai/<https:/jobs.ashbyhq.com/wordware.ai>)[About us](https://wordware.ai/</about-us>)[Use cases](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/explore>)

I‚Äôm technical
# The fastest way to build your AI stack
Build -> Iterate -> Deploy. Wordware is the ultimate toolkit for building production-ready AI.
# Anyone can build AI with‍Natural Language Programming
Your expertise deserves better than waiting for engineers. Join the revolution and create sophisticated AI solutions using plain English.
[Try for free](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/register>)
No credit card required.
[Book a demo](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/book>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e00e60b2e9ed72634c2a0e_rect.svg)
Discover
### See Wordware in Action
Don't take our word for it. Explore existing Wordware use cases to see how Wordware can benefit you too!
Models for a single question
This WordApp runs a question through GPT-4 Turbo, GPT-4, GPT-4o, Mistral Medium, Mixtral, Openchat, Claude 3 Opus, Claude 3 Sonnet, Claude 3 Haiku, Command R, LLAMA 3 8B, and LLAMA 3 70B. Then it uses Claude 3 Opus to assess which model gave the best answer. Finally, Claude 3 Opus reviews and adjusts evaluations to ensure accuracy and validate the analysis.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/7c82f38c-4f88-484d-8d93-5c55f7863ff2>)
This app has already run 2,463 times.
Basic ReAct Agent
What is an agent? Generally 'agent' is used to refer to any system that can make decisions autonomously about how to solve a problem. It can be used to describe a lot of things from chatbots that can use tools/perform RAG to highly general agents that attempt to solve any given task such AutoGPT. These highly general agents tend not to perform very well!
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/73fd941f-7127-47d3-a6a2-05d283274ea6>)
This app has already run 6,323 times.
Personal website creation
This app does a few cool things: 
1. üïµÔ∏è‍‚ôÇÔ∏è Researches the person (make sure to provide detailed info to avoid mix-ups with others sharing the same name) 
2. üé® Generates an image based on the research 
3. ‚úçÔ∏è Composes a poem about that person 
4. Reads the poem aloud using ElevenLabs 
5. üåê Creates and hosts a webpage featuring all these elements
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/8020cef8-9523-45c0-9764-6dcc4a1fce55>)
This app has already run 2,759 times.
Turn Yourself into a Lego Figure üñºÔ∏è
Become the Lego man you always wanted to be with this image generator.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/58901930-4bb4-42a2-aa1a-8868757c4ac2>)
This app has already run 8,274 times.
üî¶ Research founders to help VC prepare for the meeting
This app helps venture capitalists quickly prepare for their meetings with founders... It takes ~100 seconds to run and execute all the steps. Please be patient. üôèüèª
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/ba3a89d1-a74f-4a32-9b86-b5aed25a4f2a>)
This app has already run 12,153 times.
üìöAuthorGPT
Being an author has never been easier! Generate an entire novel in minutes with a cover image from Stable Diffusion.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/8b6d72b0-9288-497f-a1f2-83e1c84e4a75>)
This app has already run 33,345 times.
Weather report - agent üå¶Ô∏è‚ö°Ô∏è‚òîÔ∏è‚òÄÔ∏è
Getting a weather report in the style of your choice via code written by an LLM.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/c05d4080-542f-42c9-bbe2-d554e46c8480>)
This app has already run 9,057 times.
üß†Summarization & knowledge check
Check your knowledge in minutes! The program returns a structured summary of a long text and generates questions to check your knowledge of the material.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/2bca5dd1-ee32-4f15-8711-a7ac3a862649>)
This app has already run 39,438 times.
üìöBlog Post Generator
Generate blog posts in minutes. This program returns SEO-optimized blog posts focused on a given industry and topic, written in a specific style.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/5e282e9f-7afe-4f6a-96f6-93a637c6d1ed>)
This app has already run 28,820 times.
‚öñÔ∏èLegal GPT
Legal documents generated within minutes.
The program enables contract generation for compliance companies, returning documents such as compliance documents, legal documents, and governmental documents.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/e988893f-b45a-4abf-bd7d-341e8a2e6509>)
This app has already run 18,233 times.
üñºÔ∏èü§ñ Image analyzing agent
Get instant insights on your screenshot!
This program analyzes inputed image, suggests the action that could be undertaken next and then conducts this action.
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/ce7e8410-d837-4cec-9efb-b20000f60a04>)
This app has already run 7,625 times.
Gordon Ramsay reviews üçùü§¨
Rates your plate in the style of Gordon Ramsay üî•
[Run](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/r/2f5b9a13-4033-4182-8f51-bb94612862dc>)
This app has already run 42,385 times.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e41fe8fe5ba45e1ef9ac57_Frame%2015796.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e1532253d2161c8bee815a_Frame%20895-3.svg)
### Empowering developers, enabling everyone.
Wordware combines the best aspects of software with the power of natural language. Remove constraints of traditional no-code tools and empower every team member to iterate independently.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3e9ca3658c4a6fe2c1_Frame%2015844.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3726595d14b130e198_Frame%2015846.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3f56d447108832331d_Frame%2015847.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3e1864fbae2049a652_Frame%2015848.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3ea26c9eb13472e11c_Frame%2015849.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab3ee29a064a96324409_Frame%2015850.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab23f23bd14d9a220ba8_Frame%2015844.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab23211e2915301b7bfc_Frame%2015851.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2ab232551e132c44bd1aa_Frame%2015846-2.svg)
Join over 286k users from AI tinkerers to large enterprises.
### AI Tools for Every Team: Explore Wordware's Features
Wordware combines the best aspects of software with the power of natural language. Remove constraints of traditional no-code tools and empower every team member to iterate independently.
03.
#### Easily chain generation in powerful Flows
Experience the simplicity and flexibility of our Notion-like interface. With an intuitive design, you can empower your team to collaborate easily, manage prompts, switch models and streamline workflows.
04.
#### Advanced Technical Capabilities
Loops, branching, structured generation, version control and type safety helps you get the most out of LLMs, while custom code execution allows you to connect to virtually any API or execute code written live by the agent
05.
#### Multimodal by default
Seamlessly combine text, images, audio, and video within your AI workflows. Easily switch between data modalities on our platform. You can feed audio or images directly into the model, or convert them to simpler text representations. Thanks to our WYSIWYG approach, multimodal workflows are also easily debuggable.
06.
#### Prebuilt tools
Empowering AI with tools, such as speech synthesis, search, RAG, image generation, and web scraping. All included in our premium plans
07.
#### That's it!
[Run the application now](https://wordware.ai/<https:/app.wordware.ai/explore/featured/4f4910f1-f346-4c88-9e49-f4a5effb20f3>)
#### as a WordApp!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f15130e703326c6070a549_Group%20133.webp)
08.
#### Deploy your AI apps effortlessly with a single click
Experience seamless updates without the hassle of pushing to git for minor changes. Custom evaluation solutions. Our platform ensures rapid setup and scalability, allowing you to focus on innovation and growth without technical hurdles.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f2b70054c07171350a0c9d__MAIN%20COMP%202%20\(00925\).webp)

#### as a Wordware app
08.
#### Deploy your AI apps effortlessly with a single click
Experience seamless updates without the hassle of pushing to git for minor changes. Custom evaluation solutions. Our platform ensures rapid setup and scalability, allowing you to focus on innovation and growth without technical hurdles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66f15130e703326c6070a549_Group%20133.webp)
#### 286K UsersOne Incredible Experience
Discover the stories behind the numbers. Here‚Äôs what our users have to say about their experience with our product.
Wordware is one of the most exciting products I‚Äôve seen in a long time. An IDE for prompt engineering. If you‚Äôve tried to do this in code, you know how painful it is.
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3f97836a90afd906396fa_elias.webp)
Elias Str√•vik
Founder, Guineapig
Wordware actually feels very powerful. I felt the same magic today, the magic I experienced when I used Replit for the first time.
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3f9e7a1bb76d626dab818_Ishan.webp)
Ishan Goswami
Co-founder, Edden
Wow, I wish I could Angel invest in you. If you can do these two things, then we‚Äôd plug you in and then we‚Äôll be cooking with gas
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3fa0d30a0d7698f5410b7_miles.webp)
Miles Wiesenthal
Founding Engineer, Cofactory
I really really love Wordware, you‚Äôre the first vendor we‚Äôve seen that we think is just going in the right direction. It‚Äôs a pragmatic product to solve a real, relatable problem. The approach is grounded and the UX is intuitive. The thesis that ‚Äúprompting is the new programming‚Äù feels like it will ring truer and truer as we shift towards an AI-driven economy. May we never lose prompts in Slack threads ever again!!
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3fa30c15fda766960ffc1_Matt.webp)
Matt Huang
Co-founder & CPO, Cofactory
I prefer Wordware strongly over writing prompt chains for LLMs in code. It's incredibly easy to use, debugging is a breeze, and iterations are 10x faster than writing Python. You write prompts in plain English anyway, so why not the entire prompt chain? Seems silly to work another way once you've experienced this.
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e0295b124370d89e52e9e4_Avatar%20Image-2.webp)
Aditya Advani
Founder at Eldo
Your product is a game-changer for English majors. Their time has finally come.
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3fa706fb7bdb2dcd00157_Anushe.webp)
Anushe Sheikh
Responsible AI & ML Product Manager
Slight learning curve, but absurd how much I was able to chain in an hour
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3fa929837d82fa2e19c1a_Nikunj.webp)
Nikunj Kothari
Venture Partner
DUDEEEEEE what a fucking thing of beauty like holy shit. It‚Äôs one of the BEST tools I‚Äôve used
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3fac1688be8b3daafd276_Rafeh.webp)
Rafeh Qazi
Founder and CEO, Clever Programmer
No more endless slack messages with suggested prompt edits to try to refine the result. More ‚ÄòGoogle docs for prompts‚Äô where both can collaborate and work with LLMs at the same time. But most importantly it allows you to slide the controls from low/no code to allow you to interrupt with coding options. I love it.
![person photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e01bcf271f49df875d1c31/66e3faefccc153d64beedb15_Emma.webp)
Emma Mulqueeny
Head of Revenue Transformation, Causeway Technologies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e033c6ac7b06c88d607aa3_Group%20100.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e033c6f18ed7ad5ed4e886_Group%2099.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e033c91dbfc2793064555d_Group%20106.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e033c607f1d7a0709498dd_Group%20105.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e00503e1e57f5fafdfa7d5/66e033c63ac2cc9775a35f03_Group%20107.webp)

generated_description:
**Wordware: Next-Level AI Development**

Founded in 2021 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Wordware is shaking up the AI landscape with its innovative Integrated Development Environment (IDE) designed specifically for building AI agents. It‚Äôs part of the Y Combinator Batch S24 and is making waves with 300,000 users, many of whom are businesses paying between $199 and $10,000 monthly.

### What's the Deal?

Wordware‚Äôs mission is clear: **create, iterate, and deploy AI agents**. The platform enables users‚Äîregardless of their coding background‚Äîto build sophisticated AI solutions using a new programming language that blends plain English with traditional programming constructs like loops and conditionals. It‚Äôs basically programming for humans; no more deciphering complex syntax!

### Key Features

1. **Collaborative IDE**: Allows multiple users to work together seamlessly.
2. **Natural Language Programming**: Users write AI commands in plain English, making intuitive, easy-to-understand AI development available to everyone.
3. **Forking and Sharing**: Easily fork and share your projects as hosted applications.
4. **API Deployment**: Simplifies the process of integrating your AI creations with other services.

### Recent Developments

Wordware recently announced a **$30 million funding round** aimed at enhancing its service offerings. This financial boost indicates confidence in their approach and sets the stage for exciting advancements.

### What Users are Saying

Feedback has been overwhelmingly positive, with users noting how empowering it is to have a tool that dramatically reduces the time required for iteration. The platform transforms complex prompt engineering into a straightforward process, likening the experience to using Google Docs for collaboration but tailored for AI.

### Future Prospects

With its unique blend of accessibility and advanced capabilities, Wordware positions itself as a game-changer in the realm of AI tools. It encourages companies and individuals alike to harness AI‚Äôs potential without getting bogged down in technicalities. 

### Join the Revolution

Ready to jump into the world of AI development? Explore Wordware‚Äôs offerings at [Wordware.ai](https://wordware.ai), where the future of AI-driven productivity is just a click away. Whether you're a tinker or a corporate team, you‚Äôll find powerful tools tailored for your needs.
